Chicken Yakitori

Ingredients
  • 500g/1lb chicken fillets, cut into 2.5 cm pieces
  • 1 red pepper, de-seeded and cut into chunks
  • 6 shiitake mushrooms, stem removed and halved
  • small bunch spring onions
  • 3tbsp mirin
  • 3tbsp Japanese soy sauce
  • 3tbsp sake
  • 1tsp sugar
Method

  1. Thread the chicken pieces onto pre-soaked bamboo skewers, interspersing each piece of chicken with spring onion, pepper and mushrooms.

  2. Mix together the mirin, soy, rice wine and sugar and stir until the sugar dissolves.

  3. Heat a griddle pan and brush the chicken with the glaze. Turn every 30 seconds or so, brushing the top each time until the chicken is cooked through and the meat burnished to mahogany glaze.

Published: July 22 2012
